description.value: You can magically enhance weapons, armor and apply your magical nature and talents to improve your armaments. By spending 1 hour working on a weapon or armor, you can grant it the effects of a piece of grade 1 potency materia - a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DKWuJb2rSgiotOG7]{@Localize[PF2E.WeaponPotencyRune1]} for a weapon, or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ro3g2JpJXrKXVyEr]{@Localize[PF2E.ArmorPotencyRune1]} for a piece of armor - until your next daily preparations, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls for a weapon or increasing an armor's item bonus to AC by 1. This has no effect on a weapon or armor with potency materia in it.
